casebody.data:
IN RE HARMONY Q. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 12, 2017

David J. Reich, in support of the petition.

Evan O'Roark, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The petition by the respondent father for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 171 Conn. App. 568, 157 A.3d 137 (2017), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
